info.name: Darklingo++
info.description: Hey! 👋🏽 Darklingo++ is a delightful switch on the default Duolingo UI. This style presents you with a Dark Mode, the ability to change the Theme Color , and it makes both leagues and the scrollbar optional. (More to come in the future) If you find anything that isn't themed correctly, feel free to tell me; feedback is always welcome! 😁 And if you really like this style or any of my others, you can donate (only if you want to 🤗). Made with 💖 by Justin Ikeako.
info.additionalInfo: LATEST VERSION: 7.4.2 • Tips page theming fixed (Firefox) RELEVANT VERSIONS VERSION 7.4.0 • Major icon refresh 🎉🎉🎉 • More consistent text coloration • Other minor fixes VERSION 7.3.0 • Full support for Duocon VERSION 7.2.0 • Full support for Duolingo Events • Minor theming fixes VERSION 7.1.0 • Major theming fixes for Firefox 🦊 🎉 VERSION 7.0.0 🎉 • Complete rewrite • Dark mode just got darker • Consistently themed icons • Consistent interaction feedback • Around 60% smaller

data.title: The style is broken, mostly white
Dark Rows in Tables now seem a bit glaring/harsh - [RESOLVED]
